website_summaries.verdict: This is a small, simple backpack that’s perfect for errands around town.
pros: Laptop compartment in the main section to separate it from the rest of your stuff
Available in many colors and designs
Padded base protects things on the bottom when the bag is set down on a hard surface
cons: Just one external pocket, so not for those who like compartments for organizing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small-ish day pack to take into Walt Disney World. This was perfect. Not too big (even full, it fit nicely into the "locker" compartments on Mission Space), but very roomy. I'm not a fan of bags that have lots and lots of pockets -- this is simplicity itself with just the front zipper pocket and the main space with a laptop sleeve. I wouldn't call this rugged enough for camping or heavy duty use, but for a stylish day bag it was just right.
customer_reviews.author: R Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a boat bag for towel, sunglasses, sunscreen, etc. and so far so good. Good size for one person's personal items to help limit space consumption and fits everything I need. Good color/pattern so I can easily distinguish that it is mine. Only used a handful of times so will see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: ZRex1102

customer_reviews.title: These are the only backpacks our family uses because they're such good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Picked this backpack up for my high school freshman - it replaced a Dakine he'd been carrying since 2nd grade that finally bit the dust. These are the only backpacks our family uses because they're such good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Like a plastique sort of material
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is alright. Not as big as I had hoped - it only has an inside pocket on the back and the small pocket in the front. The material is cheaper than I had expected. Like a plastique sort of material. I was expecting something a bit more higher quality for the price. It's decent enough, but I'll probably have to get a larger, more durable one soon.

product_meta.title: Dakine 365 Backpack 21L
product_meta.description:
The sleek and simple 365, 21-liter backpack has everything you need and nothing you don't. The roomy main compartment features a non-padded laptop sleeve that fits most 15” laptops. The zippered front compartment holds all your smaller items. The 365 is ideal for everyday use thanks to padded shoulder straps and a durable padded bottom panel. This unisex pack is offered in numerous colors and patterns. Includes a limited lifetime warranty.

Care Instructions:
Adventures are messy. If your Dakine bag gets dirty, we recommend hand washing with mild soap (like Nikwax Tech Wash), cold water and a soft bristle brush. If hand washing is not going to do the trick, use a front loader washing machine. To ensure your backpack doesn't get tangled, place inside a pillowcase or mesh bag before washing. Always use cold water, mild soap and run on a gentle cycle. Never bleach your pack. Hang to dry in a warm but shady place, ensuring both inside and out are dry before storing.
